channel.title: NEED HELP WITH HTML/PHP Login/registration
channel.description:
hi ive been making a website recently its a ecommerce website to sell bits and pieces (thats really irrelevent) however as this website im createing will only accept paypal as payment for the itmes i obviously need a registration system and login ect.
ive looked everything i could think of up in google searching for scripts, tutsand all sorts but i still havnt found any easy understandable way to do this... i admit that i am not experience in any scripting language so maybe thats why im getting confused.
What i need from you is: a list of everything i would need to create a secure registration/login pages. scripts that would work. tuts. and maybe if some1 could explain how this is all done so i can understand it.
im using dreamweaver 8 at the moment.
i keep looking up on google for guides about logins and stuff and it keep mentioning mySQL so i downloaded that but got too confused.
thanks for all help given.
H.T.Y.A
please rely and help me asap!!

item.title: NEED HELP WITH HTML/PHP Login/registration
item.dc:creator: @hello_to_you_all hello to you all
item.description:
@hello_to_you_all wrote:

atm im using freehostia.com.

so do u know how to help me?

Read full topic

item.title: NEED HELP WITH HTML/PHP Login/registration
item.dc:creator: @Clear Clear
item.description:
@Clear wrote:

For a login/registration you need a database to store the usernames and passwords.

What host do you use?

Read full topic

item.title: NEED HELP WITH HTML/PHP Login/registration
item.dc:creator: @hello_to_you_all hello to you all
item.description:
@hello_to_you_all wrote:

oh yeah ive already done that im on freehostia.com andi already made a database.

Read full topic

item.title: NEED HELP WITH HTML/PHP Login/registration
item.dc:creator: @Clear Clear
item.description:
@Clear wrote:

Then you have to make a database and a user for the database.
E.G:
Database name: commerce
Database Username: HTYA (or) htya_commerce (Depends on your host how the database username is set up.)
Database Password: lolpword

Read full topic
